original_text:
ELVIS: THE KING Lives
Il tema di questa bella slot machine tratta dal catalogo della software house William Interactive (WMS), come da titolo è incentrata sulla figura di Elvis Presley, il leggendario re del rock, che con le sue canzoni ha conquistato un posto nella storia della musica a livello mondiale.
Ancora oggi, a distanza di oltre quarant’anni dalla sua morte, il mito di Elvis Presley è più che mai vivo, e i suoi album continuano ad essere suonati e amati da appassionati in tutto il mondo.
Il mito di Elvis è sviluppato in questa slot grazie a una grafica piacevole e a un’interfaccia divertente: tutti i simboli che si alternano sui rulli sono un tributo alla figura del re del rock, a partire dalle sue mitiche scarpe di camoscio blu, passando per la sua chitarra, un orsacchiotto di colore viola e un cane da caccia.
Lo sfondo in cui si muove Elvis in questa slot machine è una sorta di Sin City, realizzata con una grafica non eccezionale ma sicuramente ben fatta e coinvolgente.
La schermata iniziale si apre con delle foto di Elvis Presley e, ovviamente, la sua musica in sottofondo, musica che accompagna il giocatore in tutte le fasi del gioco, e che diventa parte integrante della slot, regalando un’esperienza ludica molto appassionante, in particolare per i cultori della musica in generale e del mito di Elvis Presley in particolare.
Caratteristiche principali della slot
La WMS ha nel suo catalogo già un’altra slot incentrata sulla figura di Elvis Presley, chiamata Elvis Lives, questo nuovo titolo si distingue dal precedente soprattutto in virtù del gameplay che risulta decisamente più articolato e avvincente.
Elvis the King Lives presenta 80 linee di pagamento e un set di rulli davvero particolare: troviamo infatti due mini-griglie, una con due rulli e due righe e l’altra con tre rulli e sei righe.
A prima vista questa struttura di gioco potrebbe sembrare complicata o confusa, ma una volta che si inizia a giocare ci si rende conto che la slot non è tanto difficile da padroneggiare.
Per esempio, se si vuole ottenere una combinazione vincente, occorre avere due simboli identici e adiacenti sulla prima griglia e un altro simbolo uguale, oppure un jolly, nella griglia più grande.
Su Elvis the King Lives è possibile scommettere da un minimo di 0,40 fino a un massimo di 200 € su tutte le 80 linee.
Simboli e  funzionalità speciali di Elvis the King Lives
Oltre ai simboli tematici già citati, in Elvis the King Lives troviamo anche le tradizionali carte da gioco, che come sempre hanno il valore più basso.
Per quanto riguarda i simboli e le funzionalità speciali, abbiamo un Wild rappresentato da Elvis in persona, che ha funzione di jolly; oltre a questo è presente il simbolo Elvis Feature che quando compare sui rulli per almeno tre volte regala un numero variabile di giri gratuiti, e se occupa tutta la griglia permette di vincere un premio pari a 100 volte la scommessa
Abbiamo poi il Bonus Jukebox che si attiva all’inizio dei giri gratuiti e che fa vincere premi fino a 25 volte la scommessa.

raw_translation.response:
ELVIS: THE KING Lives

This beautifully crafted slot game from William Interactive (WMS) is based on the legendary “King of Rock and Roll” Elvis Presley, who, with his music, conquered a place in the history of music worldwide. Even today, more than forty years after his passing, Elvis Presley is still a living legend, and his albums are still loved and played by fans all over the world.

The graphics of this slot machine are very pleasing, and the interface is engaging. All the symbols on the reels are a tribute to the king of rock, starting from his legendary blue suede shoes, followed by his guitar, a purple teddy bear, and a hunting dog. The background in which Elvis moves in this slot machine resembles a kind of Sin City, created with decent but engaging graphics.

The initial screen of the game opens with photos of Elvis Presley and, of course, his music in the background, which accompanies the player through every phase of the game, making it a highly exciting gaming experience, particularly for music lovers worldwide, and Elvis Presley aficionados.

Main Features of the Slot

WMS already has another slot game centered around Elvis Presley, called “Elvis Lives.” However, this new title differs from the previous one, especially in terms of gameplay, which is much more intricate and engaging. Elvis: The King Lives features 80 paylines and a distinct set of reels with two mini-grids, one with two reels and two rows, and the other with three reels and six rows. At first sight, this may seem complicated or confusing, but once you start playing, you'll realize that this slot isn't too difficult to master.

For instance, to get a winning combination, you need to have two similar and adjacent symbols on the first grid and another identical symbol or a wild card on the larger grid. You can bet from a minimum of 0.40 up to a maximum of 200 € on all 80 paylines on Elvis: The King Lives.

Symbols and Special Features of Elvis: The King Lives

Besides the above-mentioned thematic symbols, Elvis: The King Lives also has traditional playing cards, which, as always, have the lowest values. Concerning the symbols and special features, we have a Wild symbol represented by Elvis himself, which functions as a wild card. Along with this, there is also the Elvis Feature symbol that when it appears on the reels at least three times, it rewards you with a variable number of free spins, and if it occupies the entire grid, you can win a prize equal to 100 times your bet.

Finally, we have the Bonus Jukebox, which activates at the start of the free spins and provides prizes up to 25 times your bet. As an experienced gambler, you'll enjoy the excitement of Elvis: The King Lives and can immerse yourself in the aura of the legendary King of Rock and Roll.

raw_translation.response:
ELVIS: THE KING Lives

This stunning slot machine from renowned software company William Interactive (WMS) is centered around the legendary music icon, Elvis Presley. With his unforgettable music, Elvis has earned a place in the world music history as the king of rock.

Even today, over 40 years after his passing, the myth of Elvis Presley lives on, and his albums continue to be played and loved by fans all over the globe.

This slot game pays homage to the man, and it does so with impressive graphics and entertaining gameplay. The symbols that rotate on the reels are a tribute to the King of Rock, including his famous blue suede shoes, guitar, purple teddy bear, and hunting dog.

The backdrop on which Elvis performs in this slot is reminiscent of Sin City, created with an engaging and well-crafted design.

As the game begins, the iconic images of Elvis greet players, accompanied by his unmistakable tunes. The music follows the player throughout the game and becomes integral to the experience.

Key Features of the Slot
The WMS already offers another slot game featuring Elvis Presley called "Elvis Lives." However, this new title stands out for its more complex and engaging gameplay.

"Elvis: The King Lives" boasts 80 paylines and an unusual layout with two mini-grids. The first with two reels and two rows, while the other has three reels and six rows.

Although the game structure may appear daunting, it is simple to play. To secure a winning combination, players need two identical adjacent symbols on the first grid and one identical symbol or wild on the larger grid.

Players can bet between €0.40 and €200 on all 80 paylines.

Symbols and Special Features
In addition to the thematic symbols mentioned earlier, "Elvis: The King Lives" also includes traditional playing cards, which have the lowest value.

Regarding the symbols and special features, the game has a wild represented by Elvis himself, which serves as a substitute for all other symbols except for the scatter. There is also a scatter symbol, the Elvis Feature, that triggers free spins. Three or more of these symbols appearing on the reels grant players free spins, and if it occupies the entire grid, players receive a prize worth 100 times their bet. 

The Bonus Jukebox is another feature that gets activated at the beginning of free spins and can land players with prizes up to 25 times their bet.

Overall, "Elvis: The King Lives" is an electric slot game that offers a great opportunity for experienced gamblers to win big while being transported back in time to the golden era of rock n' roll.
